sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button @click="mynav" class="mybutton">Click</button>
  <nav :class="myshow ? 'container' : 'another' ">
    <router-link to="/">Home</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/new">New</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/about">About</router-link>
  </nav>
  <router-view/>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'App',
  data(){
    return{
      mshow : true,
    }
  },

  methods: {
    mynav(){
      this.mshow =!this.mshow
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style>
.mybutton {
  position: fixed;
  z-index: 999;
}
.container{
    position: absolute;
    height: 100vh;
    width: 0;
    background-color: rgb(37, 37, 194);
    clip-path: inset(0 100% 0 0);
}
.another{
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    height: 100vh;
    width: 150px;
    background-color: rgba(99, 99, 149, 0.436);
    clip-path: inset(0 0 0 0);
    transition: 2s ease;
    transition-property: clip-path;
}
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  color: #111;
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 100vh;
}
</style>
